ingredients: ;CANINE PARAINFLUENZA, STRAIN D008....AT LEAST 10^4.4 TCID50BORDETELLA BRONCHISEPTICA, STRAIN B-3053..............................AT LEAST 3.03 X 10^7 CFUNEOMYCIN (AS A PRESERVATIVE).........30 MCG
